name: Robbery at the Argon
description:
What started out as a technical exercise for a coding course has become a bit of a mechanical sandbox for testing out new mechanics and technical challenges.

How to Play: The wagon and camera will constantly move you forward, but you will need to maneuver and shoot to avoid obstacles and the sheriff's posse.

W= Forward

S= Back

A= Left

D=Right

Space= Shoot

Current Task:
-Learning and implementing menu UIs

Future Plans:
-The next step will be to create the robbery scene primarily though dialogue gameplay
